question: Ways to control Manipulated Variable / Cara mengawal Pemboleh ubah dimanipulasikan 是
A: Use the different concentration of antibiotic / Gunakan kepekatan antibiotik yang berbeza
B: Use ruler to measure the diameter of clear region / Gunakan pembaris untuk mengukur diameter kawasan jernih
C: Use the same type of bacteria / Gunakan jenis bakteria yang sama
D: Use the same size of filter paper / Gunakan saiz kertas turas yang sama

question: Aim / Tujuan 怎么写?
A: To study the effect of concentration of antibiotic on diameter of clear region / Untuk mengkaji kesan kepekatan antibiotik terhadap diameter kawasan jernih
B: What is the effect of concentration of antibiotic on the diameter of clear region? / Apakah kesan kepekatan antibiotik terhadap diameter kawasan jernih?
C: Does the concentration of antibiotic affect the diameter of clear region? / Adakah kepekatan antibiotik mempengaruhi diameter kawasan jernih?
D: The higher the concentration of antibiotic, the lower the growth of bacteria / Semakin tinggi kepekatan antibiotik, semakin rendah pertumbuhan bakteria
E: The higher the concentration of antibiotic, the smaller the diameter of clear region / Semakin tinggi kepekatan antibiotik, semakin kecil diameter kawasan jernih
